english.segment1: There is a sound, Sound of hope, Sound of love, Drawing all to come,
english.segment2: There is a sound, Sound of joy, Sound of peace, Flowing out of me,
english.segment3: Sound to heal the broken heart, Comfort for the least of these, Justice for the lawless. Righteousness and ever flowing stream, For the fatherless the widows and the orphans,
english.segment4: To hear the sound, We will release the sound of heaven,
english.segment5: They're crying, They're seeking, They're searching, For the sound of heaven,
english.segment6: They're calling, They're watching, They're waiting, For the sound of heaven,
english.segment7: They're hungry, They're thirsty, They're desperate, For the sound of heaven,
english.segment8: We will release the sound, We will release the sound, We will release the sound, Of heaven. (repeat until end)
